title: Getting message that there is network problem and i need to recconect every game
body:
As the title says, i get a message i need to retry connecting every game due to some network problem (dont remember the msg now). I have to click Cancel then Recconect from the client. It's annoying me much since i have to do this EVERY game i play.

Anyone else having this issue?

replies.body:
This is a known-issue that's listed in the Client's Issue Ticker (next to *Home* button) and on the [**Service Status Page**](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#eune). I don't have a timeline on when this issue will be fixed, but our teams are working on it!

Let me know if you have any q's!
Same for me, they changed something

I also have this issue, but for me it won't even let me get into the game at all. I press reconnect over and over and over but it still doesn't let me get into a game and now I have a 20 min queue because of it.
